entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Detect and warn when users consume OutputPath in Project files directly #41852
  • dotnet tool restore results in FileNotFoundException on linux due to case sensitivity issue #41844

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41851
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41841
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview6] Allow runtime binary into the VMR #41839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview6] Upgrade rather than install, in case .NET is on container/machine alr… #41857
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • feat: Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #40416
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Upgrade rather than install, in case .NET is on container/machine alr… #41855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add xunit configuration to increase test logging #41829
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41800
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Minimize container dependency redistribution #41740
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • Avoid redistributing MSBuild.dll #41739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Plan for addressing torn SDK builds #41790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41716
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
